includedAssets.title: Day 7: 8:00 A.M. -  9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack is back for a seventh season of heart-pumping action. In this opening fix, the FBI need Bauer's help when a familiar face returns as America's newest enemy...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack is back. In this opening fix, the FBI need Bauer's help when a familiar face returns as America's newest enemy...

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 9:00 A.M. - 10:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The terrorists show how serious they are as the air traffic control crisis escalates. Meanwhile, Jack and Renee are on the trail of the sniper who shot their suspect.

includedAssets.title: Day 7:  10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Bauer interrogates Almeida and discovers who the former CTU agent is working for. Plus, Colonel Dubaku issues a threat to the President.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Bauer finds out more information on Almeida when Buchanan takes him to a secret hideout. Meanwhile, President Taylor is forced to meet with Matobo.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The threat of terrorism escalates and Bauer is forced to take matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, the volatile investigation takes its toll on Agent Walker.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As Dubaku continues to apply pressure, the President considers negotiating with him. And Bauer concocts a plan to protect the country from a terrorist attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Dubaku continues to apply pressure, the President considers negotiating. And Bauer concocts a plan to protect the country from a terrorist attack.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 2:00 P.M. -  3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Following the President's refusal to withdraw troops, Dubaku launches a terror attack on a high-profile American. Meanwhile, Walker is recruited by Jack and Tony.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 3:00 P.M. -  4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As Jack and the team head to the White House to meet with President Taylor, Dubaku raises the stakes and plots a direct attack on the First Family.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 4:00 P.M. - 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Agent Walker chase leads through Washington DC in a bid to eliminate the latest terror threat. Meanwhile, the situation takes its toll on the President.

includedAssets.synopsis: Chloe hacks away to help Jack and Renee capture Dubaku. Meanwhile, the First Family tries to move on from their ordeal at the hands of turncoat agents.

includedAssets.title: Day 7: 6:00 P.M. -  7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The President's foreign policy dilemma deepens when Dubaku's plans escalate. Meanwhile, Jack's determination to expose conspirators has critical consequences.

includedAssets.synopsis: General Juma's diabolical plans intensify, but the President stands her ground. Meanwhile, Jack takes control when a terror threat builds momentum.

includedAssets.synopsis: Kim Bauer returns in the latest hour of the heart-pumping drama. Aided by Almeida, Jack tries to thwart a terror attack that could change America forever.

includedAssets.synopsis: In the first of an unmissable double bill finale, an explosive seventh day draws to a close. A few nasty surprises are in store for an increasingly weary Jack.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack must overcome attempts to put him away for life, while dealing with a new and imminent terrorist threat. Kiefer Sutherland is Jack Bauer again in a heart-pounding seventh season.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
